mods.abstract: DETAINED in the jail of the parish of St. John the Baptist the negro boy NED aged about 25 years, meauring 5 feet 7 inches in height; he says he belongs to Mr. Philippe Landry, of Ascension. The owner is hereby duly notified to claim his property according to law. Parish of St John the Baptist, this 16th June 1859. URSIN JACOB, Sheriff.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
